font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 使不安： to disturb the composure of
【例】 We were disconcerted by the unexpected changes to the program.
【近】 abash, discomfit, disconcert, discountenance, mortify, rattle
【反】 calm, compose, quiet, settle, soothe, tranquilize 平息抚慰
【记】 dis不 + concert 和谐一致
